医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Rapid Novor 和 MAbSilico 合作开发全球首个人工智能引导的抗体表位作图服务Rapid Novor 和 MAbSilico 合作提供世界上第一个全面的人工智能引导表位作图服务。该服务将氢氘交换质谱 (HDX-MS) 与先进的人工智能 (AI) 驱动的计算模型结合起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Rapid-Novor-and-MAbSilico-partner-for-worlds-first-AI-Guided-epitope-mapping-service-for-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Rapid-Novor-and-MAbSilico-partner-for-worlds-first-AI-Guided-epitope-mapping-service-for-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56cca328-9750-486a-8afa-92fe0c183d16 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 12:10:00 -0400 Rapid Novor and MAbSilico partner for world's first AI-guided epitope mapping service for antibodies
剂量软件可加速 ICU 脓毒症患者的抗生素疗效昆士兰大学的研究人员使用剂量软件来加速抗生素对重症监护室脓毒症患者的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Dosing-software-accelerates-antibiotic-effects-in-ICU-患者-treatment-for-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Dosing-software-accelerates-antibiotic-effects-in-ICU-患者-treatment-for-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ba74315-82e9-43dd-a22a-340f22538a6b Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:52:37 -0400 Dosing software accelerates antibiotic effects in ICU patients treated for sepsis
研究表明人工智能工具在回答遗传咨询问题方面具有很高的准确性一项新研究发现，人工智能工具正确回答了 83% 的常见遗传咨询问题，包括有关基因检测和遗传综合症的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-shows-AI-tools-high-accuracy-in-answering-genic-counseling-questions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-shows-AI-tools-high-accuracy-in-answering-genic-counseling-questions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a806349-09b6-4cb7-bcf4-224c5924f7bf Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:42:14 -0400 Study shows AI tool's high accuracy in answering genetic counseling questions
临床试验旨在为“无法手术”的胰腺肿瘤患者提供手术解决方案南加州大学 Keck Medicine 的一项临床试验旨在为先前被认为无法手术的晚期胰腺癌患者提供手术解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Clinical-trial-aims-to-provide-a-surgical-solution-for-病人-with-inoperable-pancreatic-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Clinical-trial-aims-to-provide-a-surgical-solution-for-病人-with-inoperable-pancreatic-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29e8d0e3-7991-403f-9b0f-c45aa29bfd3f Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:30:56 -0400 Clinical trial aims to provide a surgical solution for patients with 'inoperable' pancreatic tumors
研究表明肥胖青少年极低热量饮食的安全性和可接受性在欧洲肥胖大会 (ECO 2024) 上发表的新研究发现，在经验丰富的营养师的密切监测下，短期极低热量饮食对于中度至重度肥胖的青少年来说是安全的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-reveals-safety-and-acceptability-of-very-low-calorie-diets-in-teenagers-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Study-reveals-safety-and-acceptability-of-very-low-calorie-diets-in-teenagers-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d888a6bc-4df7-4474-9560-e9d645122b65 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:24:00 -0400 Study reveals safety and acceptability of very low calorie diets in teenagers with obesity
新研究使用真实世界数据揭示了帕金森病进展的关键差异现实世界和研究人群之间帕金森病 (PD) 进展的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/New-study-reveals-key-differences-in-Parkinsone28099s-disease-progression-using-real-world-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/New-study-reveals-key-differences-in-Parkinsone28099s-disease-progression-using-real-world-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=399bad0b-9858-4168-a04d-f8aee17e7f3f Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:18:00 -0400 New study reveals key differences in Parkinson’s disease progression using real-world data
无创血液检测显示结直肠癌检测灵敏度达 83%，为早期诊断带来希望使用游离脱氧核糖核酸 (DNA) 筛查结直肠癌的血液检测方法的性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Non-operative-blood-test-shows-8325-sensitivity-in-detecting-colorectal-cancer-offering-hope-for-early-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Non-operative-blood-test-shows-8325-sensitivity-in-detecting-colorectal-cancer-offering-hope-for-early-diagnosis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=406d0b84-0b67-4a3a-b1e5-ccf47485bea9 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:48:00 -0400 Non-invasive blood test shows 83% sensitivity in detecting colorectal cancer, offering hope for early diagnosis
释放藜麦的力量：从营养到药物开发关于藜麦生物活性成分及其健康益处的现有数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Unlocking-quinoas-power-Beyond-nutrition-to-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Unlocking-quinoas-power-Beyond-nutrition-to-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=808f8541-1afc-41fc-9a57-ad3579dd7577 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:08:00 -0400 Unlocking quinoa's power: Beyond nutrition to drug development
气候变化如何影响媒介传播疾病的传播？气候变化、天气和其他人为因素对媒介传播疾病的影响在全球蔓延。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/How-is-climate-change-influencing-the-spread-of-vector-borne-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/How-is-climate-change-influencing-the-spread-of-vector-borne-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0602c8b2-d4d2-48c1-bc40-f861116cf782 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:37:00 -0400 How is climate change influencing the spread of vector-borne diseases?
Immunome 选择将 Arrayjet 的 ArrayPlex 平台用于发现靶向癌症疗法Immunome 签署协议，在其内部筛选操作中使用 Arrayjet 平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Arrayjete28099s-ArrayPlex-platform-selected-by-Immunome-for-use-in-its-discovery-of-targeted-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Arrayjete28099s-ArrayPlex-platform-selected-by-Immunome-for-use-in-its-discovery-of-targeted-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=849e3e85-4a57-4b1a-ba18-e5ac0cdecbde Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:08:00 -0400 Arrayjet’s ArrayPlex platform selected by Immunome for use in its discovery of targeted cancer therapies
